text.div:
GradedAmountVS ValueSet

A set of codes that give a qualitative description of the amount of something, for example, the volume of wound exudate.

name: GradedAmountVS
title: Graded Amount VS
publisher: HL7 Patient Care WG and Community-Based Care and Privacy WG
description: A set of codes that give a qualitative description of the amount of something, for example, the volume of wound exudate.

concept.display: Equivocal. Equivocal represents a borderline value, too close to call; for example, a value very close to a cut-off between positive and negative.
Indeterminate. Indeterminate means the results were uninterpretable, or cannot be determined; technical issues prevented obtaining a valid result.
